ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone keeps complaining about the effects on our new armor, myself included.  (Don t get me wrong I LOVE enduring breath on the gloves!!!! Anyone who
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone keeps complaining about the effects on our new armor, myself
included. (Don't get me wrong I LOVE enduring breath on the gloves!!!!
Anyone who doesn't is silly)

But nobody has suggested alternatives. I would love to see ideas on things
we could get (be realistic) that we can't already do with songs that we use
relatively regularly.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath


----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 6:14 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


> i've never used forage nor complained about a low cap. and i hate the
> effects on the legs and boots =) level 25 is "nifty" to get something
like
> this. level 53 to get these is completely useless. a warrior getting
> invisibility at level 53 however is something they would absolutely DIE
for.
> all 51+ bards already have to deal with a majority of useless songs above
> 50. now we have to deal with useless effects on the majority of our
armor.
> and still i play my bard and love my bard. and i've never bashed verant
or
> complained about class balance. but i won't make up excuses to justify
> these effects being worth anything. it's like a bad joke. sorry i am at
> work and cranky, no offense.
>
> Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
> Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > Everyone seems to be using Summon Food and Drink as the prime
> > examples of
> > uselessness. Well aren't we the class that has been
> > complaining rather
> > loudly for over a year that our forage was capped so darned low? Well
> > aren't we?
> >
> > Warrior Greaves cast Invisibility. That's cool, but we have
> > a song for that
> > guys. Think about it, we *don't* have songs that can summon
> > food and drink.
> > I think it's kinda nifty, but I will admit that I hope the BP
> > casts Gate.
> > :)
> >
> > [51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
